def has_message_body(status):
    """
    According to the following RFC message body and length SHOULD NOT
    be included in responses status 1XX, 204 and 304.
    https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616#section-4.4
    https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616#section-4.3

    Returns True if the status code permits a message body, False otherwise.
    """
    # Status codes 1xx (100-199), 204 and 304 must not include a message body.
    if (100 <= status < 200) or status in (204, 304):
        return False
    return True

def has_message_body(status):
    """
    According to the following RFC message body and length SHOULD NOT
    be included in responses status 1XX, 204 and 304.
    https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616#section-4.4
    https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616#section-4.3
    """
    # Per RFC:
    # - 1xx (informational), 204 (No Content), and 304 (Not Modified)
    #   responses MUST NOT include a message body.
    if (100 <= status < 200) or status in (204, 304):
        return False
    return True

def has_message_body(status):
    """
    According to the following RFC message body and length SHOULD NOT
    be included in responses status 1XX, 204 and 304.
    https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616#section-4.4
    https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616#section-4.3
    """
    return not (100 <= status < 200 or status == 204 or status == 304)

    """

    be included in responses status 1XX, 204 and 304.
    https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616#section-4.4
    https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616#section-4.3
    """
    # Status codes 1XX (100-199), 204, and 304 should not include a message body.
    if (100 <= status < 200) or status in (204, 304):
        return False
    return True

def has_message_body(status):
    """
    According to the following RFC message body and length SHOULD NOT
    be included in responses status 1XX, 204 and 304.
    https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616#section-4.4
    https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616#section-4.3
    """
    # Per RFC 2616, responses with status codes:
    # 1xx (100-199), 204, and 304 should not have a message body.
    if (100 <= status < 200) or status in (204, 304):
        return False
    return True
